ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If he s like me he d much rather be playing his L50 char. I know I would. I don t like playing twinks. When I start another character it s on a brand new
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Jan 24/00, "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...> wrote:
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Are you having fun playing your 21st shaman? If so then you (jackal) have
> plenty of things to do to keep you occupied until the expansion comes out.
> Your shaman still has to suffer from all the problems with the game that IMO
> need to get fixed. If you don't have fun playing anything but your 50 necro
> then thats a different story.

If he's like me he'd much rather be playing his L50 char. I know I
would. I don't like playing twinks. When I start another character it's
on a brand new server. Unfortunately, this means I end up losing touch
with my old friends on my old server after a while, which means the old
character ends up not being played very often.
